# VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel.accurate

**Case**

Accurate text recognition takes more time to produce a more comprehensive result.

## Declaration

```swift
case accurate
```

## Recognition Levels

- **VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel.fast**: Fast text recognition returns results more quickly at the expense of accuracy.
